Text.Name: PlayerName
Text.OnTextChanged: Parent.DoCommand.onshow=('hide_window Custom.DrumsUI_CF.AutoLoad') COND1=(Text=='NoName') COND2=(Text==sName) COND3=(Text=='') COND=(COND1 || COND2 || COND3) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(COND ? false : true) sName=Text

Button.Name: Load
Button.OnShow: show_window Custom.DrumsUI_CF_Settings show_window Custom.CF_CheckCurse show_window Custom.CF_CurseOnly show_window Custom.CF_CheckGroup show_window Custom.CF_CheckRaid Visible=false

Text.Name: Counter
Text.OnTextChanged:
Parent.Data.TraumaDD.DynamicData=(ddType)##(Text)##('.Effect1') Parent.Data.ArcaneDD.DynamicData=(ddType)##(Text)##('.Effect2') Parent.Data.NoxiousDD.DynamicData=(ddType)##(Text)##('.Effect3') Parent.Data.ElementalDD.DynamicData=(ddType)##(Text)##('.Effect4') Parent.Data.CurseDD.DynamicData=(ddType)##(Text)##('.Effect5')
bCheck=(Text > iMaxNum) Parent.CheckCure.visible='!'bCheck
bCheck2=(sCmdType == 'g') bCheck3=(Text < 50) bCureRaid=(Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_CF_Settings.CheckRaid.checked == true) bResult=(bCheck && bCheck2 && bCheck3 && bCureRaid) Parent.CureRaid.visible=bResult

Button.Name: CheckCure
Button.OnShow:
bCheck1=(Parent.Data.TraumaDD.localtext > 0) bCheck2=(Parent.Data.ArcaneDD.localtext > 0) bCheck3=(Parent.Data.NoxiousDD.localtext > 0) bCheck4=(Parent.Data.ElementalDD.localtext > 0) bCheck5=(Parent.Data.CurseDD.localtext > 0)
Parent.DoCure.sCmdType=Parent.Counter.sCmdType Parent.DoCureCurse.sCmdType=Parent.Counter.sCmdType Parent.DoCure.iCmdNum=(Parent.Counter.Text + 1) Parent.DoCureCurse.iCmdNum=(Parent.Counter.Text + 1)
bResult=(bCheck1 || bCheck2 || bCheck3 || bCheck4) bCurseOnly=(Parent.Parent.CF_CurseOnly.Width == 1) bResult2=(bResult && bCurseOnly) Parent.DoCure.visible=bResult2
bCureCurse=(Parent.Parent.CF_CheckCurse.Width == 2) bNoCures=(bResult == false) bResult3=(bCureCurse && bCheck5 && bNoCures) Parent.DoCureCurse.visible=bResult3
Visible=false

Button.Name: DoCureCurse
Button.OnShow:
sFullCmd=(sCmdType)##(iCmdNum) useabilityonplayer sFullCmd Cure Curse
Visible=false
